price: 4 Il n’est pas d’homme qui ne soit surveillé[1574].
arabic: إِن كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ لَّمَّا عَلَيۡهَا حَافِظٞ
footnotes: [1574] Par un ange chargé de consigner ses œuvres.

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: in kullu nafsin lammā ʿalayhā ḥāfiẓun
